name: Relevium Medical
headline: Platform injectable gel based therapeutic for osteoarthritis
description:
Relevium Medical is developing an injectable gel for knee osteoarthritis. Approximately half the population will be diagnosed with this pain and progressive disease.
Right now, patients have to undergo not only repeat injections to control their pain, but also have to take strong oral medications. Because the disease is progressive and only gets worse over time, many patients end up on highly addictive, high-dose opioids. 
To date, we have secured $3.7 million in non dilutive funding and completed preclinical testing. We demonstrated that our drug is safe, selectively blocks nerves that transmit pain, and provides pain relief that lasts four times as long. 
Insurance currently pays $770 per six-monthly treatment for knee osteoarthritis. With 5 million patients in the US, this represents a $7.7 Bn market opportunity.
This platform biotherapeutic can also be used to treat other joints affects by osteoarthritis such as the hip and ankle, where the same problems exist in treatment care.

founders.name: Alison Liddy, Founder
founders.description: Alison is CEO and Founder at Relevium Medical.  Alison holds qualifications in Chemistry and Biochemical Engineering (M.Sc. & Ph.D.). She has worked for major multinational companies including ROCHE, Cook Medical and Boston Scientific; and completed the BioInnovate Fellowship in the prestigious Stanford BioDesign-affiliated program at NUI Galway, Ireland. She is the named inventor on over 20 patent publications and the winner of the Science Foundation of Ireland’s €1 million innovation prize.

## Innovative.Life-changing. 
**Relevium Medical** are a biopharmaceutical company with locations in Ireland and the US. We aspire to improve the lives of people with debilitating chronic pain conditions through creating superior treatments.
[ About Us ](https://relevium-medical.com/</about-relevium-medical>)
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/6399addbd95d40325d7f3344/ff2f95c1-3f95-4be8-a55b-767b08a23f78/iStock-663613046+%282%29.jpg)
Video is not available or format is not supported. Try a different browser.
## PharmaceuticalExcellence
Chronic pain is our therapeutic pillar - validated as an urgent clinical need by key stakeholders. Our science integrates natural biopolymers with pharmacologically active agents. This pioneering approach allows tailoring of treatments to different chronic pain conditions, and a range of novel platform hydrogel products with superior efficacy versus existing treatments.
[ Science ](https://relevium-medical.com/</science-and-technology>)
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/6399addbd95d40325d7f3344/5a534fa1-e332-4a03-9677-20a57f07435e/iStock-1186118442+%281%29.jpg)
## EndlessPossibility
**Relevium Medical** are creating a pipeline of novel pharmacological hydrogel treatments for our chosen focus areas, giving healthcare professionals superior solutions that improve patient outcomes.
[ Pipeline ](https://relevium-medical.com/</our-pipeline>)
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/6399addbd95d40325d7f3344/b15e2338-dfaf-4624-82a8-00889c767ceb/Logo-graphic-%5BVectorized%5D.jpg)

generated_description:
**Relevium Medical: Pioneering Pain Relief in Osteoarthritis**

Founded in 2019 and nestled in Galway, Ireland, Relevium Medical is pushing the boundaries of biopharmaceuticals. The company has a focused mission: to develop an injectable gel that addresses the debilitating pain of knee osteoarthritis—a condition that approximately half the population faces at some point. 

Osteoarthritis is a progressive disease, and current treatment regimes often involve not just frequent injections but also reliance on strong oral medications. This paradigm frequently leads patients to highly addictive opioids as they seek relief. Relevium's innovative therapy aims to disrupt this pattern by offering a safer, more effective alternative. Their injectable gel has completed preclinical testing, boasting a safety profile that selectively blocks pain-transmitting nerves and delivers pain relief capable of lasting four times longer than conventional options.

Financially, Relevium has secured $3.7 million in non-dilutive funding, illustrating confidence in their ambitious plans. In a landscape where the US market alone for knee osteoarthritis treatments is pegged at a staggering $7.7 billion, the company’s prospects are bright. Their focus doesn’t end with the knee; they're also exploring applications for other joints like the hip and ankle, where similar challenges exist.

Part of the Y Combinator Batch S22, Relevium is a small team of five, but their vision is grand. They are leveraging natural biopolymers combined with pharmacologically active agents, crafting a robust pipeline of hydrogel products tailored for chronic pain. Their approach underscores a commitment to innovation and excellence, aiming to enhance patient outcomes significantly.

With a solid foundation in science and a market ripe for disruption, Relevium Medical is on a mission to transform the lives of chronic pain sufferers, one injection at a time. For more insights into their revolutionary journey or the science behind their product, check out their [website](https://relevium-medical.com/).
